timeline.message: IGNITE-13472 fix security context for JDBC bulkload operations
IGNITE-13472 fix security context for JDBC bulkload operations

timeline.bodyText: It seems that we should check TEST_BULKLOAD_CACHE cache size here and check its size using equality.
timeline.author: ololo3000

timeline.bodyText: Can we verify that the cache size has only increased by one?
timeline.author: ololo3000

timeline.bodyText: An operation can be performed without a security context if the worker was rejected.
timeline.author: NSAmelchev

replies.bodyText: No, it will be executed in current context, which we give to worker. So, in case of reject we already have proper context.
replies.author: SomeFire
